name: Dr. Zooka's Magnificent Murderous Molecules
description:
Dr. Zooka has finished her all-powerful Atomic Cannon, and like all scientists, she needs to test it out.  And what better test subjects are there than the local wildlife? 

Find the correct atom for the correct animal to kill them. Choosing the wrong one will still deal half damage, but there will be a time penalty. If time runs out, the Atomic Cannon will lose health. Lose all health, and it's game over!

This is a game jam entry for the "It Matters" theme from the SJSU Game Dev club
